title: Apply for Unemployment Benefits
description: A recently laid-off citizen needs to apply for unemployment insurance benefits online.

tasks.description: Gather the citizen's personal information, social security number, and previous employment details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully collects all required information for the application.

tasks.description: Verify the applicant's identity and employment history against state records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully validates the applicant's information.

tasks.description: Submit the application and provide the citizen with information on next steps, including how to certify for weekly benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the application and provides clear instructions for the citizen.
